## Psychometric Validation Framework

### Table A.1: LVDC Validation Requirements

::: {.landscape}
::: {.tbl-colwidths="20,30,30,20"}
| Validation Type | Target Metrics | Methods | Timeline |
|----------------|----------------|---------|----------|
| **Reliability** | • α ≥ 0.80 per subscale<br>• Test-retest r ≥ 0.70 | • Internal consistency analysis<br>• 2-week retest design | Months 1-3 |
| **Validity** | • Convergent r > 0.60<br>• Discriminant r < 0.40<br>• Predictive validity established | • Correlation with wisdom scales<br>• Big Five discrimination<br>• Longitudinal outcomes | Months 3-9 |
| **Invariance** | • Configural<br>• Metric<br>• Scalar | • Multi-group CFA<br>• Age/gender/culture groups<br>• IRT analysis | Months 6-12 |
| **Utility** | • Meaningful change scores<br>• Clinical cutoffs<br>• Growth trajectories | • Responsiveness testing<br>• Normative sampling<br>• Case studies | Months 9-18 |
:::
:::

## Economic Modeling Parameters

### Table A.2: Value Concentration Model Variables

::: {.tbl-colwidths="25,15,35,25"}
| Variable | Symbol | Definition | Measurement |
|----------|--------|------------|-------------|
| **Computable Output** | Qc | Quantity of AI-generated cognitive work | Tasks/hour |
| **Human Output** | Qh | Quantity of irreducible human contribution | Depth × Impact |
| **Price Ratio** | Ph/Pc | Relative price of human vs. AI work | Market pricing |
| **Authenticity Parameter** | σ | Weight on verified human origin | 0 ≤ σ ≤ 1 |
| **Depth Indicator** | D | Presence + Cohesion + Meaning score | LVDC profile |
| **Time Constraint** | T | Human temporal finitude | Hours available |
| **Complementarity** | γ | Synergy in human-AI teams | Productivity gain |
:::

### Formal Model Sketch

**Utility Function**:
```
U = f(Qc, Qh; σ, D)
where ∂U/∂Qh increases in σ and D
```

**Production Function**:
```
Y = A[αQc + βQh + γ(Qc × Qh)]
where γ > 0 represents complementarity
```

**Equilibrium Condition**:
```
Ph/Pc = (∂U/∂Qh)/(∂U/∂Qc) × (∂Y/∂Qc)/(∂Y/∂Qh)
```
